# ms-fwk-lib

> A Spring Boot infrastructure framework library for microservices

## Overview

ms-fwk-lib is a Kotlin library providing common infrastructure components for Spring Boot microservices, including web filters, exception handling, MDC (Mapped Diagnostic Context) utilities, and configuration components.

## Tech Stack

- Language: Kotlin
- Framework: Spring Boot 4.x
- Build: Gradle 9.1.0 (Kotlin DSL)
- Java: 25
- Testing: JUnit 5, SpringMockK

## Quick Start

```bash
./gradlew build    # Build the project
./gradlew test     # Run tests
./gradlew clean    # Clean build artifacts
```

## Project Structure

- /lib - Main library module
- /lib/src/main/kotlin/com/rubensgomes/msfwklib/common - Constants and utilities
- /lib/src/main/kotlin/com/rubensgomes/msfwklib/config - Spring configurations
- /lib/src/main/kotlin/com/rubensgomes/msfwklib/threadlocal - Thread-local context utilities
- /lib/src/main/kotlin/com/rubensgomes/msfwklib/web/aspect - AOP components (exception handling)
- /lib/src/main/kotlin/com/rubensgomes/msfwklib/web/filter - Servlet filters
- /lib/src/test/kotlin - Unit tests

## Key Components

- GlobalExceptionHandler: Centralized exception handling for REST APIs
- MDCClearFilter: Clears MDC context after request processing
- JsonRequestIntrospectFilter: Introspects JSON request bodies
- CachedBodyHttpServletRequest: Wrapper for re-readable request bodies
- ContextHolder: Thread-local context management
- MDCConstants: Standard MDC key constants

## Configuration

- lib/gradle.properties: Module version and artifact settings
- gradle.properties: Developer info and repository URLs
- settings.gradle.kts: Version catalog configuration
